events.name: SpoCode Hackathon
events.about:
The focus of this hackathon is to create software solutions for Spokane issues.  At this event you will be presented with several issues that face Spokane City.  You will have the option of choosing these problems or addressing one that you see.  You will form teams and spend the weekend hacking the solution.  Prizes will be given to the top three teams.  Your team will be judged on creativity, ability to execute your idea and quality of your code.

At this event you will learn about the great products and services Mongo DB offers.  At this event you are free to develop on any platform you wish.  We will have great offers from our sponsors.  We encourage all participants to take advantage of these offers from the great companies investing in our community.

       Prizes: Sponsored by Git Hub

  • Grand prize: 1 year of Silver plan
  • Second prize: 1 year of Bronze plan
  • Third place: 6 months of Bronze plan

           More to come! Stay tuned!

Agenda

Friday, April 27

  • 6:00pm: Registration open and Pizza

  • 7:00pm: Welcome & team formation
  • 7:30pm: Let the hacking begin
  • 10:00pm:  Venue closes,

Saturday April 28

  • 9:00am: Breakfast Served

  • 12:00: Lunch

  • 3:30pm: Close all hacking, sign ups for presentations

  • 4:00pm: Presentations and Judging Begin (3-5 Minutes each)

  • 5:30pm: Judges present awards
